name: Wireless Security
description: Sector template for wireless-specific security patents including WiFi security, Bluetooth security, cellular security, and wireless protocol authentication.
contextDescription: Wireless security patents protect wireless communications from eavesdropping, unauthorized access, and attacks specific to wireless protocols. Technologies include WPA3, 802.1X, EAP methods, SIM-based authentication, Bluetooth pairing security, and wireless intrusion detection.
scoringGuidance: Patents addressing specific wireless vulnerabilities (KRACK, BlueBorne, etc.) score higher on threat coverage.
Multi-protocol security (WiFi + Bluetooth + Cellular) increases market coverage.
Integration with cellular security (SIM, eSIM, 5G security) is high value for mobile.
Wireless-specific side-channel attacks (signal analysis, jamming detection) are specialized value.

questions.question: Which wireless protocols does this patent secure? Score 1-3 for single legacy protocol (WEP, older Bluetooth), 4-6 for current protocols (WPA3, BLE 5.x), 7-10 for multi-protocol or next-gen (WiFi 7, 5G security).
questions.reasoningPrompt: List wireless protocols: WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular (4G/5G), Zigbee, LoRa, etc.

questions.question: How robust is the wireless authentication mechanism? Score 1-3 for pre-shared key only, 4-6 for 802.1X/EAP, 7-10 for advanced (SIM-based, certificate, multi-factor wireless auth).
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe wireless authentication: PSK, 802.1X, EAP methods, SIM-based.

questions.question: Does this patent address over-the-air attack protection? Score 1-3 if encryption only, 4-6 for replay/MitM protection, 7-10 for comprehensive OTA security (jamming detection, rogue AP detection).
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe OTA security: eavesdropping protection, MitM, jamming, rogue detection.

questions.question: Does this patent improve secure device pairing? Score 1-3 if not addressed, 4-6 for improved pairing protocols, 7-10 for novel secure pairing (OOB, proximity-based, biometric).
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe pairing security: Bluetooth pairing, WiFi Easy Connect, NFC bootstrap.

questions.question: Does this patent include wireless intrusion detection? Score 1-3 if none, 4-6 for basic rogue detection, 7-10 for comprehensive WIDS (attack classification, localization, response).
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe WIDS capabilities: spectrum monitoring, attack detection, response.
